name: Blockout! (afamdrank)
description:
Hello!

Thanks for Taking a look at my game! 

In this game, you control 1 of 2 characters. 

Daigo, the purple man in white, controlled using keyboard.
And Steven, the green man in black, controlled with a controller.

MECHANICS:

The game is based around blocking, so you don't really want to just knock down your opponent. 
The goal is to block a lot of attacks made by your opponent. For each blocked attack, you get 1 point added to your "Block Score".
When you land an attack on your opponent, the block score is added to your total score +5. You need 50 points to win!

CONTROLS:

Daigo -KEYBOARD-
-Arrow keys to move
-Space bar to attack
-Shift key to block

Steven -CONTROLLER-
-D-pad to move
-"A" to attack
-"B" to block

CREDIT:

Whiff and Block sounds-Freesound
“Sound Search.” Freesound, https://freesound.org/search/?q=slap.

Music- "Ryu's Theme" Street Fighter II, Yoko Shimomura, Isao Abe
Street Fighter II (1991) Capcom

All other resources created by me (Adam Frank)
